<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dweomerweave Robe](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1316)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 50</row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn clothing

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This robe is made from dweomerweave, a magical fabric created by spinning minor illusions into the threads of [ether spider](/Monsters.aspx?ID=203) silk. Dweomerweave is naturally hazy and translucent. It can take on the illusory appearances of other fabrics and garments, and _dweomerweave robes_ are coveted by adventurers who want to travel light without compromising on fashion.

<document level="2" id="action-1032" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
